posts.content:
Just putting the feelers out to see if anyone knows who does collection of splits from Midlands to sort of way down South, probably 160 miles ,? Needs to be a really good service.

Thanks

Ron

Try Jamie of Ox transport 07871 185504

Really nice chap and looks after the busses well

Cheers

Matt
Fully covered or just a flat bed ?

Would prefer the fully covered but it will come down to cost,

Ta

Ron

author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.

posts.content:
I used a local bloke (local to me anyway) who has a fully covered trailer and is used to transporting vintage astons and ferraris etc. he got my bus in the back but I had to take the racks off. I think his max height was 68" but you'd need to check. His trailer is quite low and also tilts down to extremely lowered vehicles aren't a problem. His name is peter and his number is 07770 343313. He was very reasonable and if you have both postcodes should be able to give you a price over the phone.

Cheers, Lee.

MattBulliBus wrote:Try Jamie of Ox transport 07871 185504

Really nice chap and looks after the busses well

Cheers

Matt


Seconded.
